mapper.select: /* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getTradingAreaGroupByList */ SELECT *, SUM(CT_SHOP) AS STORES, SUM(CT_OPEN) AS OPEN, SUM(CT_CLOSE) AS CLOSE, SUM(CT_OPEN) + SUM(CT_CLOSE) AS OPCL, SUM(RAC.SUM_00_06) + SUM(RAC.SUM_06_11) + SUM(RAC.SUM_11_14) + SUM(RAC.SUM_14_17) + SUM(RAC.SUM_17_21)+ SUM(RAC.SUM_21_24) AS SALES , LEFT(COM_CD2,1) AS CODE FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM RAC WHERE RAC.YEAR = (SELECT YEAR FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.QRT = (SELECT QRT FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.COM_CD2 != '' GROUP BY AREA_CD, LEFT(COM_CD2,1)

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getTradingAreaAllList */ SELECT *, LEFT(COM_CD2,1) AS CODE FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM RAC WHERE RAC.YEAR = (SELECT YEAR FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.QRT = (SELECT QRT FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.COM_CD2 != ''

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getTest */ SELECT *, LEFT(COM_CD2,1) AS CODE FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM RAC WHERE RAC.YEAR = (SELECT YEAR FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.QRT = (SELECT QRT FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA_COM ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RAC.COM_CD2 != '' AND RAC.AREA_CD IN (${scope})

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getTradingAreaCountList */ SELECT COUNT(*)
, LEFT(EMD_CD, 2)
, LEFT(EMD_CD, 5)
FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA RA WHERE RA.AREA_DIV_CD = #{code_type2} AND RA.YEAR = (SELECT YEAR FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND RA.QRT = (SELECT QRT FROM ST_RESEARCH_AREA ORDER BY YEAR DESC, QRT DESC LIMIT 1 )
GROUP BY LEFT(EMD_CD, 2)
GROUP BY LEFT(EMD_CD, 5)

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getRegionAreaList */ SELECT A.* , B.AREA_TYPE_NAME , B.STROKE_WEIGHT , B.STROKE_COLOR , B.STROKE_OPACITY , B.STROKE_STYLE , B.FILL_COLOR , B.FILL_OPACITY , B.OVER_FILL_COLOR , B.OVER_FILL_OPACITY FROM ST_REGION_AREA A INNER JOIN ST_TRADING_AREA_TYPE B ON A.AREA_TYPE = B.AREA_TYPE WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY A.AREA_SEQ

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : countResearchShop */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT
, RS.EMD_CD AS CODE, RS.EMD_NM AS NAME
, RS.EMD_CD AS CODE, '서울특별시' AS NAME
FROM ST_RESEARCH_SHOP RS
WHERE RS.CODE_TYPE1 IN (${scope}) AND RS.LATITUDE BETWEEN #{x1} AND #{x2} AND RS.LONGITUDE BETWEEN #{y1} AND #{y2} GROUP BY RS.EMD_CD
WHERE RS.CODE_TYPE1 IN (${scope}) GROUP BY LEFT(RS.EMD_CD, 2)

/* file : AreaMapper.xml, id : getResearchShopPublicTransport */ SELECT LBS.LONGITUDE AS buslng, LBS.LATITUDE AS buslat, LSS.LONGITUDE AS sublng, LSS.LATITUDE AS sublat FROM ST_RESEARCH_SHOP RS INNER JOIN ST_LOCATION_BUS_STATION LBS ON RS.ARS_ID = LBS.ARS_ID INNER JOIN ST_LOCATION_SUBWAY_STATION LSS ON RS.SUB_STA_NO = LSS.SUB_STA_NO WHERE RS.SHOP_SEQ = #{shopSeq}
